name: Left Or Right (kiriko)
description:
The source code is available here.

How to play :

Left Touch(Click) - Go down one stair in the same direction.

Right Touch(Click) - Go down one stair in the other direction

Key features:

- Simple one touch game

- Addictive and endless fun game-play.

- Optimized for mobile

- 2D Flat design.

- Full C# code.

The source code is available here.
